query: How do I reset my password?

ground_truth.expected_answer: You can reset your password by clicking 'Forgot Password' on the login page. You'll receive an email with a reset link that expires in 24 hours.
ground_truth.context: Password reset documentation includes: 1) Click 'Forgot Password' link, 2) Enter email address, 3) Check email for reset link, 4) Link expires in 24 hours, 5) Click link to set new password

ground_truth.expected_answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all purchases. To request a refund, contact our support team with your order number.
ground_truth.context: Refund policy: 30-day money-back guarantee on all products. To request refund: contact support with order number. Refunds processed within 5-7 business days. Original payment method will be credited.

query: How can I upgrade my subscription plan?

ground_truth.expected_answer: You can upgrade your subscription by going to Account Settings > Billing > Change Plan. The upgrade takes effect immediately and you'll be charged a prorated amount.
ground_truth.context: To upgrade subscription: Navigate to Account Settings > Billing > Change Plan. Select desired tier. Changes are immediate. Prorated billing applies. You can upgrade anytime without losing existing data.

query: Is my data encrypted and secure?

ground_truth.expected_answer: Yes, all data is encrypted in transit using TLS 1.3 and at rest using AES-256 encryption. We are SOC 2 Type II certified and comply with GDPR.
ground_truth.context: Security measures: TLS 1.3 for data in transit, AES-256 encryption at rest, SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, regular security audits, 24/7 monitoring, data backups every 6 hours.

ground_truth.expected_answer: Yes, you can export your data at any time. Go to Settings > Data Export and choose your preferred format (CSV, JSON, or XML). The export will be emailed to you within 24 hours.
ground_truth.context: Data export: Available in Settings > Data Export. Supported formats: CSV, JSON, XML. Export delivered via email within 24 hours. Includes all user data and activity logs. No limit on export frequency.

ground_truth.expected_answer: We support integrations with Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Workspace, Salesforce, Jira, and over 100 other tools via our API and Zapier.
ground_truth.context: Available integrations: Direct integrations with Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Workspace, Salesforce, Jira, GitHub, Asana. Additional integrations via Zapier (100+ apps). REST API available for custom integrations. Webhooks supported.

query: How do I add team members to my account?

ground_truth.expected_answer: Go to Settings > Team > Invite Members. Enter their email addresses and assign roles (Admin, Member, or Viewer). They'll receive an invitation email to join.
ground_truth.context: Team management: Settings > Team > Invite Members. Enter email addresses. Available roles: Admin (full access), Member (standard access), Viewer (read-only). Invitation sent via email. Team members must accept invitation within 7 days.

query: What's the maximum file size I can upload?

ground_truth.expected_answer: Standard plans support files up to 100MB. Premium plans support up to 500MB, and Enterprise plans support up to 2GB per file.
ground_truth.context: File upload limits by tier: Basic - 50MB, Standard - 100MB, Premium - 500MB, Enterprise - 2GB. Supported formats: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PNG, JPG, MP4. No limit on number of files.

ground_truth.expected_answer: Phone support is available for Premium and Enterprise customers. Premium customers get phone support during business hours (9am-6pm EST). Enterprise customers get 24/7 phone support.
ground_truth.context: Support channels by tier: Basic/Standard - email and chat support. Premium - email, chat, and phone (business hours 9am-6pm EST). Enterprise - 24/7 email, chat, and phone support with dedicated account manager.

query: Can I try your service before purchasing?

ground_truth.expected_answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all Premium features. No credit card required to start your trial.
ground_truth.context: Free trial: 14 days with full Premium features access. No credit card required. No automatic billing after trial. Can upgrade to paid plan anytime during trial. Trial data is preserved if you upgrade.
